rules_text: {G}, Sacrifice Eroding Caterpile: Destroy target artifact or enchantment, if you are stagnant, Surveil 2. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn. To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
